name: Fire Hogs From Space
description:
Fire Hogs From Space

How does your submission match the theme?

The player can make use of a fire extinguisher for two purposes, to move around the level and to extinguish the flames of the enemies in order to defeat them.

Gameplay

The player is equiped with a fire extinguisher, which he can use (by pressing and holding the left mouse button) to move the character and to extinguish the enemies for a short amount of time. When an enemy is stunned in this way, the player can use the vacuum (by pressing and holding the right mouse button) to pull an enemy and keep hold of it until he lets go of the button which shoots the enemy in the direction the player is facing. If the enemy is thrown into an asteroid or another enemy, it is killed and the player is awarded points. The object of the game is to get as many points as possible before the player is killed.

Third Party Resources

- Engine used: Unity Free

- Some particle effects: Starter Particle Pack 

- Game music: playonloop.com

- Sound effects: freesound.org
